text: I m tiredHi guys I was depressed before quarantine and I could easily hide my depression of my parents  because my parents don t come in my room often but during quarantine I had several anxiety attacks and moments where I cried for hours straight  I almost never left my room and days turned into weeks  I was stuck in a loop where I couldn t take care of myself  hygiene eat  My mom sent me to several therapists even before quarantine because she found a diary of mine where I said some of my intrusive thoughts  that s the thing that pushed her to take me to a therapist lmao even after I complained about not feeling well  She kind of dismissed it  the idea of me needing a therapist  but I kept on insisting and when she did let me see therapists  the ones I saw didn t work  I have a new therapist now but I ve only seen her twice in the span of two months and when we talk it doesn t help me  I ve been on vacation for a week now in another country and I just want to go home  I ve had a LOT of intrusive thoughts recently  I think of killing myself everyday  I ve talked about it to my friends but I didnt t want to scare them so I pushed them away and now I only have   friends left  even if that s a lot  I only have one that is a close one and I can t seem to talk to her about anything  The last time I tried I had a huge anxiety attack and to cheer me up she poured water on my back  because she didn t know how to react  and I re went in this phase where I couldn t breathe properly or move  I just ran to the bathroom and started to hit my head on the wall  I can t decide if I want to live or die because living seems like such a burden but I couldn t live in a world afterlife without my family friends and music I m sorry I m venting I just can t tell this to anyone else rn TL DR  venting about my mental health life and contemplating suicide
